    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static OddStore getInstance()

      • setMaxAge

        public void setMaxAge(int maxAge)
        set expiration for objects in cache. If this method is not called, then objects will remain in the cache forever
        Parameters:
        maxAge - maximum age of objects in milliseconds before they are removed from cache

      • getObject

        public OddObject getObject(java.lang.String id)

      • getObjects

        public java.util.List<OddObject> getObjects(java.util.Collection<Identifier> identifiers)
        objects that do not exist will not be included in the returned list.
        Parameters:
        identifiers - all elements should be non null
        Returns:
        all elements will be non null

      • containsAllRelatedObjects

        @Deprecated
public boolean containsAllRelatedObjects(OddObject oddObject)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated because of potential issue when using maxAge. The store could contain all objects and then the objects could be removed before retreiving them. Checks if the store contains all objects that are related to the oddObject non recursively
        Returns:
        true if all related objects are stored, otherwise false.

      • getRelatedObjects

        public java.util.List<OddObject> getRelatedObjects(OddObject oddObject)
        Get all OddObjects contained in all of the relationships of an OddObject. Recursive relationships are not resolved.
        Returns:
        a list of all related nonnull OddObjects. Related objects that aren't in the OddStore will not be included in list.

      • remove

        public void remove(OddObject object)

      • clear

        public void clear()
        removes all objects from store
